alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 1:46PM AKST until December 09 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES INTO SATURDAY EVENING... The highest accumulations have fallen in the area from the back of the Mendenhall Valley and North of the Ferry Terminal, and at higher elevations. Snow ratios have decreased through this morning and accumulations have slowed down during the day time. Snow will tapper off Saturday evening. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Extra travel time may be needed due to slick roads. Heavy wet snow could be difficult to manage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
